is-absolute

Return true if a file path is absolute.

Based on the isAbsolute utility method in express.

Install

Install with npm:

npm i is-absolute --save-dev

Usage

var isAbsolute = require('is-absolute');
console.log(isAbsolute('abc'));
//=> ['a', 'b', 'c'];

API

Example:

isAbsolute('a/b/c.js');
//=> 'false'

isAbsolute('C://a/b/c.js');
//=> 'true'
  • filepath {String}
  • return {Boolean}
